detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract DragonNetwork (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DragonNetwork.sol#97-260) has payable functions:
	 - DragonNetwork.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DragonNetwork.sol#109-111)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
